Welcome to Citrix SDK Portal¶

Citrix SDK Portal contains SDK documents for major Citrix product. Include StoreFront, Desktop Delivery Controller, Desktop Director, HTML5 Receiver and XenServer

The main documentation for the site is organized into a couple sections: (Think of it as Continuous Documentation).

  • StoreFront SDK
  • Desktop Delivery Controller SDK
  • Desktop Director SDK
  • HTML5 Receiver SDK
  • XenServer SDK

StoreFront SDK¶

  • Getting Started
  • Sample Code
  • API Reference

  • Sample Code
  • API Reference
